Control Name: Implements Filters to Analyze Anomalies—Management has implemented procedures to filter, summarize, and analyze anomalies to identify security events.

control_attributes.Control: Implements Filters to Analyze Anomalies—Management has implemented procedures to filter, summarize, and analyze anomalies to identify security events.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC7.2 The entity monitors system components and the operation of those components for anomalies that are indicative of malicious acts, natural disasters, and errors affecting the entity’s ability to meet its objectives; anomalies are analyzed to determine whether they represent security events.
